text: hello fellow H2C'ers - I probably won't be able to make happy hour this week - what's the best way to contribute / participate to leg conversations this week?
I ran it in Van 2 last year w/ Justin and his brother (I believe they were 1 and 2 and I was 3). Happy to give insights into my runs if anyone is considering leg 3.
<@U026NB2U2>: <@U0HUKRME0> Would it be possible to have you guys on Skype? We can take notes otherwise.
yes - depends on when - and you might hear a screaming baby in the background :slightly_smiling_face:
I think there are plenty of veterans on the team, but I’m happy to lend help wherever i can too
I'm available by skype or google hangouts.
<@U026NB2U2>: <@U0260V4K1> <@U0HUKRME0> The meeting is set for THIS Thursday at 5:30-6:30. Justin if you are able to stay for a portion of it that would be amazing.
shoot - I’ll be out for squamish :confused:
well - whoever gets Leg 2, hit me up, I’ve run that specific grouping 4 times
I'll be at the in-laws for an all family bbq - so it might be tricky - but I'll have my phone on me - I'll see if I can skype in w/o causing drama
if you can’t make it marce, no worries! just let me know what your leg preferences are
9, 10, or 12 (in that order) would be my prefs
thank you for all the coordinating!
